data.title: Nicotinamide riboside kinases display redundancy in mediating nicotinamide mononucleotide and nicotinamide riboside metabolism in skeletal muscle cells
data.meta_description: These results identify skeletal muscle cells as requiring NAMPT to maintain NAD<sup>+</sup> availability and reveal that NRK1 and 2 display overlapping function in salvage of exogenous NR and NMN to augment intracellular NAD<sup>+</sup> availability.
